refnamediv.refpurpose: Constructs by linearization a linear state-space model from a general dynamical system described by a Xcos diagram

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Construct a linear state-space system by linearizing a model given as a Xcos diagram. The idea is to transform a sub-diagram to a linear state-space model. The sub-diagram should have inputs and outputs.
The output is a Scilab data structure of type continuous-time state-space linear system.

refsection.title: Examples

listitem.para: x0 : column vector. Continuous state around which linearization to be done (default 0)
u0 : column vector. Input around which linearization to be done (default 0)

param : param: list with two elements (default list(1.d-6,0)) param(1): scalar. Perturbation level for linearization; the following variation is used del([x;u])_i = param(1)+param(1)*1d-4*abs([x;u])_i. param(2): scalar. Time t.

para.link: steadycos - Finds an equilibrium state of a general dynamical system described by a xcos diagram (Scilab Function)
scicos_simulate - Function for running xcos simulation in batch mode (Scilab Function)
